[Portrait]Alma
[Dialog]Elder Simon!{END}

Elder, speak to me!{END}

[Portrait]Elder Simon
[Dialog]Uhhn... Lady Alma...? What...what are
you doing here?{END}

Never mind that.
What happened here?{END}

You...you must leave this place at
once, child. It is not safe.

Men have come...come seeking the
Stone.{END}

[Portrait]<Ramza>
[Dialog]A Zodiac Stone? Then it is as
Alma said!{END}

The Virgo Stone is one of...one of
the crown jewels of Ivalice.

It was given into our keeping when
Lady Ovelia was brought here for her
fosterage...as proof of her royalty.{END}

And the ones come to take it-who
are they?{END}

You are...Alma's elder brother?
<Ramza>, was it not?

I beg you, my son-leave them be.
Block their way, and they will only
cut you down.{END}

[Portrait]Man's Voice
[Dialog]Where's the bloody Stone!?{END}

[Portrait]Second Man's Voice
[Dialog]Patience! It's here somewhere.
We need only look harder!{END}

[Portrait]Third Man's Voice
[Dialog]Come, this leads to the lower vaults!{END}

I am branded a heretic and hunted by
the Church.

Am I to assume the Stones I now
possess are the reason? Who are
these men? Please, I must know!{END}

...Very well. High Confessor Marcel and
his followers seek to restore the Church
to prominence.
As a first step, they have set Dukes Larg
and Goltanna against one another to
whittle down their military might.
The longer the fighting lasts, the weaker
the dukes become-and the more the
people lose their faith in the Crown.{END}

And by gathering these Stones, and
reviving the Zodiac Braves? What do
they hope to gain from such a show?{END}

The support of the people, of course.{END}

Truly? The cardinal used his Stone
to infuse himself with the strength
of the Lucavi.
If such is the power of the Zodiac
Stones, it is a power to rival that of
any army.
Is that strength not what the High
Confessor seeks?{END}

You are unlike your brothers. You remind
me a great deal more of your late lord
father.
You-you may well have what is needed
to put a stop to their ambitions.{END}

Wait here. I am going after them.{END}

And I with you!{END}

We cannot leave Elder Simon here alone.
Find a safe place to hide. Wait there with
him until I return!{END}

Very well.{END}

I shall leave the auracite with you,
lest the worst befall me.

If I fail to return, cast it into the
Bugross Sea.{END}

It pains me that I can do no more
at times like this.

How I wish I'd been born a man
like you.{END}

Don't be ridiculous! Who would I ever
turn to if I didn't have my little sister?{END}

<Ramza>...{END}

Take Elder Simon to safety!{END}
